title: Hoyle.2013.Card.Puzzle.and.Board.Games-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents -=-

             Hoyle 2013 Card Puzzle and Board Games (c) Encore


Release On   : 10 September 2013    Disk Amount/Format : 1 CD ISO
Type of Game : Puzzle               Media Protection   : Nothing


Feeling lucky? Go all in with Hoyles Vegas-style casino action for your PC
and Mac! Includes two BONUS slot games!

Features

Learn, practice and master over 20 classic cards games and 25 exciting puzzle
and board games.

Completely updated graphics.
Larger easy-to-read cards.
Modern in-game interface design.
Challenges never stop with over 10 different in-game
Puzzle opponents and 25 in-game card opponents.
Select from a variety of challenges, speed of play, characters, and more!
Create the perfect player with HOYLEs Face Creator.
Track your progress with in-game statistics and achievements.

Bonus includes: The Official Hoyle Rulebook & Strategy Guide!


Burn/mount, install, play!


Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO


                                                                  (C) E/dfs
                         " SIZE DOES NOT MATTER! "
